block_comment: This block implements a delay module in a dynamic RAM (DRAM) system. The code specifically delays the "ras_n" signal by a predefined period defined by "BUS_DELAY". The incoming "ras_n" signal is passed through a delay line, and the result of that process "ras_n_in", is assigned to the delayed output. The delay event is triggered by any change to the "ras_n" signal.
